game.name: The Weeping Swan: Ten Days of the City's Fall
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: At nightfall, the sieged city falls. Yaoguai came to massacre. You are nothing but a scholar on the brink of madness, trying to survive alongside a courtesan you met years ago. Experience two intertwined storylines created by the developer of the best-selling Chinese visual novel.
